Fault.name: BPEL/approveLargeOrder.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the expression in <bpel:condition> is a boolean expression.
Fault.msg: The expression $GetCreditCardStatus_execute_InputVariable.Reque ... in <bpel:condition> is not a boolean expression.

Fault.name: Mediators/RequestRoute.mplan
Fault.msg: Transformation required for Case "FileReference.execute" having different source and target part name types. Please make sure the source and target message part name are same and of same type.
